title: Absalom and Achitophel a poem.
author: Dryden, John, 1631-1700.
notes: A satire directed against Shaftesbury and Monmouth.
Commendatory verses by Duke and Lee.
Attributed to John Dryden. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
Place and date of publication from Wing.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
